subject: DO YOU KNOW A FRANK RATKA IN THIS GROUP?
author: Manto
full_text: HELLO IM MANDO FROM GREECE PLEASE NEED HELP I HAD TWO MESSAGES FROM EVP ITC GROUP FROM SOMEONE FRANK RATKA AND HE IS TALKING ABOUT A WORKING AT HOME SITE  BUT THE WEIRD IS THAT THEY WERE FOR OTHER MAILS NOT MINE WHAT IS THAT?IF ANYONE KNOWS PLEASE LET ME KNOW IF ITS HACKING THANK YOU
